title: Recognizing Speech in Python
summary: When it comes to computing heavy application such as recognizing speech, there is a tendency to move towards statically typed compiled languages citing speed. However I have built a speech recognizer completely in Python and able to achieve very good performance with it and hence would like to give a demo of it and share my experience.
